question.en-US: Could you show me where the bed is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我床在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我床喺邊度啊？

question.en-US: Where can I find the closest vase to me?
question.zh-CN: 在哪里可以找到离我最近的花瓶？
question.zh-HK: 喺邊度可以搵到離我最近嘅花瓶？

question.en-US: Where is the nearest potted plant to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的盆栽在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅盆栽喺邊度？

question.en-US: Could you identify where the dog is?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定狗在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定狗喺邊度呀？

question.en-US: Where is the closest backpack in relation to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的背包在哪里?
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅背囊喺邊度？

question.en-US: Could you show me where the bed is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我床在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我床喺邊度啊？

question.en-US: Can you point out the bed in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能指出场景中的床吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以指出場景中嘅床啊？

question.en-US: Could you point out the location of the lamp to me?
question.zh-CN: 你能给我指出台灯的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以畀我指出台灯嘅位置啊？

question.en-US: Can you please locate the couch?
question.zh-CN: 你能找到沙发吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以搵到梳化啊？

question.en-US: Where is the bed in relation to my current position?
question.zh-CN: 相对于我当前位置，床在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 相對于我當前位置，床喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you point out the bed in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能指出场景中的床吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以指出場景中嘅床啊？

question.en-US: Where can I find the closest vase to me?
question.zh-CN: 在哪里可以找到离我最近的花瓶？
question.zh-HK: 喺邊度可以搵到離我最近嘅花瓶？

question.en-US: From my current position, which way is the keyboard?
question.zh-CN: 从我目前的位置来看，键盘是哪个方向？
question.zh-HK: 從我目前的位置來看，鍵盤是邊個方向？

question.en-US: Can you direct me to the location of the remote?
question.zh-CN: 你能把我引向遥控器的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能把我引向遙控器的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Could you guide me to the position of the tv?
question.zh-CN: 你可以引导我去到电视的位置嗎?
question.zh-HK: 你可以引導我去到電視嘅位置嗎？
